short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add new notes to your Anki decks with a click of a button

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add new notes to your Anki decks with a click of a button!

At the moment these sites are supported:

1. https://pl.wiktionary.org/

More sites can be easily added. Say which ones you want :)
The project is open-source and any help is welcome!

How to use
1. Run Anki Desktop on your computer - https://apps.ankiweb.net/
2. Make sure AnkiConnect add-on is installed - https://ankiweb.net/shared/info/2055492159.
3. Open one of the supported websites.
4. Find the Anki Deck dropdown and choose the desired deck.
5. Click on the Anki button to add a new note with the front and the back already filled :)
